verses.roman:
pauṇḍrako 'pi tad-udyogam
upalabhya mahā-rathaḥ
akṣauhiṇībhyāṁ saṁyukto
niścakrāma purād drutam

synonyms: pauṇḍrakaḥ—Pauṇḍraka; api—and; tat—His; udyogam—preparations; upalabhya—noticing; mahā-rathaḥ—the mighty warrior; akṣauhiṇībhyām—by two full military divisions; saṁyuktaḥ—joined; niścakrāma—went out; purāt—from the city; drutam—quickly.
translation: Upon observing Lord Kṛṣṇa's preparations for battle, the mighty warrior Pauṇḍraka quickly went out of the city with two full military divisions.
